ingredients: 3 cups chicken broth or 3 cups chicken stock
1 (19 ounce) can diced tomatoes and juice
1 leek trimmed, washed and thinly sliced
3 cups beef broth or 3 cups beef stock
1 (14 ounce) can white kidney beans drained & rinsed
½ cup dried spaghetti broken into pieces
1 (14 ounce) can red kidney beans drained & rinsed
